biotools.summary: Webserver for modeling biologically relevant protein conformational changes. The approach has been shown to reproduce experimentally observed conformational variabilities in the case of domain and loop motions and is able to generate meaningful pathways of conformational transitions.

bioschemas.name: NMSim
